dmca.title: [ABUSE] a Problem
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
[mailto:abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
VmprFreak@aol.com
Sent: Friday, April 21, 2006 5:07 PM
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: [ABUSE] a Problem


Hello,
 
I am currently having a problem with a site that is hosted by you. The
site is http://www.batista-unleashed.com/index02.html
<http://www.batista-unleashed.com/index02.html> 
 
They have some pictures of mine on their site, in the photo gallery. The
pictures were NOT sent in by me. In fact, they were taken off a private
account and sent in by someone else. 
 
I have emailed the site several times, asking them to remove the
pictures. The pictures are personal and i do NOT want them on this
site.They have not done so yet. So i am asking you to take them down for
me. 
 
The direct links to the pictures are as follows:
http://www.batista-unleashed.com/PhotoGallery/albums/Candids/AutographSe
ssions/candid24.jpg
<http://www.batista-unleashed.com/PhotoGallery/albums/Candids/AutographS
essions/candid24.jpg> 
 
http://www.batista-unleashed.com/PhotoGallery/albums/Candids/Fans/fan-ca
ndid15.jpg
<http://www.batista-unleashed.com/PhotoGallery/albums/Candids/Fans/fan-c
andid15.jpg>
<http://www.batista-unleashed.com/PhotoGallery/albums/Candids/Fans/thumb
_fan-candid34.jpg> 
 
http://www.batista-unleashed.com/PhotoGallery/albums/Candids/Fans/fan-ca
ndid34.jpg
<http://www.batista-unleashed.com/PhotoGallery/albums/Candids/Fans/fan-c
andid34.jpg> 
 
I think it is great for fans to gather and share pictures. But ONLY when
the pictures are sent in willingly. I felt violated when a friend told
me that my pictures were on the site without my permission.
 
Any help is greatly appreciated.
 
Thank You,
Sarah Sanders
